sub_title: Solopreneur | User Acqusition, Ads, and Analytics Consultant @tanu.agency
summary:
When you look at your Profit and Loss Statement… do you think “How can I get more paying clients?!”

Hi, I’m a marketer and the founder of Tanu Agency. I’m helping trainers, consultants and other entrepreneurs attracting customers on a more consistent basis.

Some of my clients have a solid customer acquisition strategy but lack a proper execution, while others are founders who don’t have time for every aspect of their business. I help them gain great clients consistently so they can focus on building and providing the best services.

----------------------
How can I help you?

😟You’re struggling to get enough clients to pay for your services/products. 
👌 I can help you fast track the customer acquisition process. I will use a mix of Google Ads/ Facebook Ads that gets you new customers in no time.

📉 Ads are emptying your wallet. I can review your current Google Ads/Facebook Ads settings and identify where it’s going wrong. 
🚀Then, I will share some recommendations to get your cash flow positive ASAP. (hint: I’m doing it for FREE).

💸You get many visitors on your website, but no dollars (or euros, bitcoins, gold etc.). I can help you optimize your landing pages with content that converts. 
🤑A few tweaks here and there can get you back on track. For this, I’m using Google Optimize.

🤷‍♂️ You get significant results, but you don’t know why. There are many wizards out there, but digital marketing doesn’t involve simple magic tricks. What works today, may not tomorrow. You can go from heaven to hell in a matter of days. 
🧐 I can help you better understand the correlation between your customer acquisition investments and the results. For this, I’m using a great free solution called Google Data Studio.

Getting your business in front of the right people couldn't be more accessible. But you better know what you are doing. And that's exactly where I’m building my expertise!

------------------
Send me a LinkedIn message and start a conversation.
Or you can email me and say hi - hello@tanu.agency - Ask me how much I price my services and I will tell you at the second reply. 
Bonus: a special surprise comes with the third reply 😉

treasury_media.title: Google Ads vs Facebook Ads Dashboard
treasury_media.description: Get a dashboard to know where should you invest more: Google Ads or Facebook Ads ?

treasury_media.title: Check your Google Ads performance - Free (no sign-up, no email)
treasury_media.description:
Captain Obvious told me that in order to understand how your campaigns are performing, you have to analyze your Google Ads account.

But it's not always that easy to find the small variable that will enhance your paid ads efforts. 

With more than 7 years of Google Ads campaign management, I have identified several key metrics that let you know what should be changed in order to increase your chances for higher sales or conversions.

treasury_media.title: Customer success story - DutchReady Google Ads Campaign by Tanu Agency

school.name: Academia de Studii Economice din București

profile_positions.description:
I have created Tanu Agency to help entrepreneurs and businesses enhance their paid ads strategy by taking full advantage of ad platforms machine learning algorithms.


5 Steps Approach:

1️⃣ Run audits to understand if I can optimize the ad account or if my potential customers should start from scratch

2️⃣ Decide what is the right mix of Google and Facebook Ads based on the customers niche, budget and strategic objectives (awareness, lead generation, purchases)

3️⃣ Implement campaigns with a simple structure, optimized for a conversion event specific to a prospect’s phase in the conversion funnel:
   - 1 objective per campaign
   - 1 Adset/Ad Group per product/service category
   - prefer dynamic Ads

4️⃣ Let the ad platform algorithm do the magic for 10-15 days

5️⃣ Optimize the campaigns based on the performance analysis


Outcome For My Customers:

Inkamototours | January - March 2020
👉Travel agency for motorbikes tours in Peru
+30% increase in ROI
- 67% lower Cost per Lead

DutchReady | April 2020 - April 2021
👉Dutch courses for expats living in the Netherlands
+230% more weekly leads
+209% increase in monthly ROI

Mises library | January - March 2021
👉Romanian online bookstore for economics books
+176% Sales compared to previous year

NXP Semiconductors | March - June 2021
👉Netherlands-domiciled American semiconductor manufacturer
- Reach more than 500k people to improve the employer’s brand awareness in Romania
- 10% Ad recall lift among people who interacted at least one time with the Ads
- Understand the place of acquisition channels (Facebook and LinkedIn) in the job application process


I’m A Pro User Of These Solutions:

📢Marketing
Google Ads
Google Optimize
Google Analytics (UA and GA4)
Google Data Studio
Google Tag Manager (client and server side)
Facebook Ads
Facebook Conversion API
Hotjar

💻Websites
Wordpress

📧 Email automation
Mailer lite
Gmass

⚙️Workflow automation
Integromat
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Performance marketing strategies & execution plans for Sorare - a leading global fantasy sports game:
- Develop and manage user acquisition and remarketing campaigns
- Manage budgets and campaigns across all digital channels to drive strong return on investment and
efficient CPA
- Identify and test new channels to continue to meet or exceed established critical metrics;
- Express my passion for new technologies and football with really cool colleagues
profile_positions.title: Growth Marketer

profile_positions.description:
Helping KIMO reach its growth ambitions:
- B2C acquisiton campaigns with Google Ads and Facebook Ads
- Digital Analytics with Google Analytics and BigQuery
- Data Visualisation with DataStudio
- Many other cool stuff that you can do in a young startup 😃
profile_positions.title: Full stack marketer

profile_positions.description:
This is a short-term assignment as the Manager of the Digital and Multichannel activities for the French branch of Sanofi Pasteur.

My main activities during this time:
•	Deploy a customer engagement plan with digital channels
•	Prepare an online training for pharmacists
•	Gather pediatric communities in an online platform
•	Establish partnership with innovative Health actors
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
I continue my activity inside Sanofi Pasteur as the Digital Marketing Manager for the Central Europe Region (17 countries). My role was to deploy the digital marketing strategy at the regional and local levels.

An overview of my main activities:
•	Audit of existing digital initiatives and recommendations for countries
•	Deploy Google AdWords, Facebook Ads and email marketing campaigns through the customer journey
•	Create dashboards for Conversion tracking
•	Develop travel health business in selected countries
•	Integrate digital marketing data with sales data
•	Establish partnerships with medical education associations
•	Support KOLs (Key Opinion Leaders) for their online communication
•	Conduct internal digital marketing training programs
profile_positions.title: Multichannel & Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Sanofi Pasteur is a world leader in human vaccines that provides more than 1 billion doses of vaccines each year making it possible to immunize more than 500 million people worldwide per year.

My role as an intern inside the new Global Digital and Strategy department was to contribute to the deployment of the digital strategy.

An overview of my main activities:
•	Community manager for an internal digital community
•	Project management for an e-learning platform
•	Newsletter creation and KPI analysis
•	Create user guides for social media usage in the pharmaceutical environment
•	Initiate a crowdfunding platform for internal projects
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Intern

profile_positions.description:
Publicis K1 is an agency in charge of the French CRM program for Mondelez & Unilver.

As a Junior Digital project manager, my role was to run projects across web and mobile environments. A summary of my activities and achievements:
•	Develop a  unified dashboard from several data sources (email campaigns, Google Analytics, several AdServers etc)
•	Debut in Google AdWords campaigns
•	Update mobile apps
•	Coordinate webdesigners and developers
•	Various webmastering activities in Drupal
profile_positions.title: Junior Digital Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Junior World Entrepreneurship Forum (or JWEF) is a think-tank dedicated to entrepreneurship. JWEF promotes entrepreneurship to young generations in order to create future wealth and social justice.

As the Head of Digital activities, I used to:

•	Develop a new Wordpress website 
•	Define the website SEO strategy
•	Implement an online ticketing tool
•	Be the community manager for the Facebook page and create a Twitter account
•	Create Newsletters
profile_positions.title: Head of Digital

profile_positions.description:
